results.content: Bradley has a great way of explaining why we are doing what we are doing in the modules. I have taken a few other courses which are learning by doing but they just speed through the coding without much explanation. This makes it very difficult to learn as a beginner. Thank you Bradley

results.content:
Very clear explanations.  Explanations can be a bit long-winded at times, but other than that, this is a great course for anyone new to Javascript.

Highly recommended.

results.content: This was an amazing learning Experience. I ve learned great deal from this course. the Only thing i wanted to know more is how to Create Different Drop-Down, tree and other Menus using JQUERY. Please if you could help me with a site or a link at webdev blog of yours.

results.content_html: Hard to emplane JS in such a short course.

results.content:
This course is perfect for anyone wanting to learn Javascript, It's very well put together and very easy to understand, the video's are clear and precise. 
As the title says, the only real way to learn is by doing, and Bradley's teaching methods are easy to follow and understand, within no time I was coding in Javascript.
Great Course.....
results.content_html:
This course is perfect for anyone wanting to learn Javascript, It's very well put together and very easy to understand, the video's are clear and precise.
As the title says, the only real way to learn is by doing, and Bradley's teaching methods are easy to follow and understand, within no time I was coding in Javascript.
Great Course.....

results.content: I love the way Bradley teaches with his step-by-step examples that teach the methods and really make them stick. At the time I am writing this review, there is still more to added, but the content as it stands is fantastic for the beginning coder of JavaScript! Thanks Bradley!
results.content_html: I love the way Bradley teaches with his step-by-step examples that teach the methods and really make them stick. At the time I am writing this review, there is still more to added, but the content as it stands is fantastic for the beginning coder of JavaScript! Thanks Bradley!

results.content: I have taken some JavaScript course as part of a web development course. I wanted to take this one to further my knowledge about JS and learn in depth from the beginning. However, I found this course to be very unhelpful and disorganized from the start. There is no flow of what the course attempts to teach or what the target is at the end of a lesson. I would have been completely lost and confused watching this had I not learned some JS prior to this.
results.content_html: I have taken some JavaScript course as part of a web development course. I wanted to take this one to further my knowledge about JS and learn in depth from the beginning. However, I found this course to be very unhelpful and disorganized from the start. There is no flow of what the course attempts to teach or what the target is at the end of a lesson. I would have been completely lost and confused watching this had I not learned some JS prior to this.

results.content: Mr. Bradley is a very good teacher and the information is given in a very progressive way. Yes, "by doing" is the best method. Thanks
results.content_html: Mr. Bradley is a very good teacher and the information is given in a very progressive way. Yes, "by doing" is the best method. Thanks

results.content: I thought that knowing HTML and CSS was enough for front end development. Now I see how important JavaScript is. I'm so glad I took this course, in just a few hours, I learned everything I could need about JavaScript!
results.content_html: I thought that knowing HTML and CSS was enough for front end development. Now I see how important JavaScript is. I'm so glad I took this course, in just a few hours, I learned everything I could need about JavaScript!

results.content: I went into this course knowing zero about javascript, but thanks to Bradley's course i feel like a javascript expert
results.content_html: I went into this course knowing zero about javascript, but thanks to Bradley's course i feel like a javascript expert

results.content: This course is useful for JavaScript basics. I also gained a few tidbits that I hadn't encountered in other courses I've taken to date, but I would never classify the material as "complete and practical". If anything, it's a small stepping stone to really learning how to apply the technology in real-world ways.
results.content_html: This course is useful for JavaScript basics. I also gained a few tidbits that I hadn't encountered in other courses I've taken to date, but I would never classify the material as "complete and practical". If anything, it's a small stepping stone to really learning how to apply the technology in real-world ways.

results.content: I can't believe how easy Bradley made JavaScript. I've been so confused with it for months, and now I feel like a pro!
results.content_html: I can't believe how easy Bradley made JavaScript. I've been so confused with it for months, and now I feel like a pro!
